hero.title: Building a skilled, adaptable, and inclusive workforce
hero.description: Access employment services, benefits, and support programmes that help citizens succeed

ei.title: Universal Credit
ei.description: Financial support if you're on a low income or out of work
ei.details: Universal Credit is a payment to help with your living costs. It's paid monthly - or twice a month for some people in Scotland.

oas.title: State Pension
oas.description: Regular payment from the government when you reach State Pension age
oas.details: The State Pension is a regular payment from the government most people can claim when they reach State Pension age.

cpp.title: Pension Credit
cpp.description: Extra money for pensioners on a low income
cpp.details: Pension Credit gives you extra money to help with your living costs if you're over State Pension age and on a low income.

jobSearch.title: Find a Job
jobSearch.description: Search and apply for jobs across the United Kingdom
jobSearch.details: Find a job is a service from the Department for Work and Pensions. Search thousands of jobs and apply online.

benefitsFinder.title: Benefits Calculator
benefitsFinder.description: Work out what benefits you could get
benefitsFinder.details: Use an independent benefits calculator to check what benefits you could get.

chat.title: Ask EVA
chat.subtitle: Employment Virtual Assistant
chat.placeholder: How can I help you today?
